languages.text: {n}Повинуясь приказу, серво-голова крепко вцепляется в горло живой. Металлический клюв, словно тиски, продолжает сжиматься, пока противница не издает жалкий вопль. Доказав свое превосходство, машина оставляет искалеченную вторую половину в покое.{/n}

{n}The servo-head immediately obeys your command as it lunges and snaps at its living counterpart's throat. The metal beak tightens like a vice until the victim gives a plaintive shriek. Having asserted its dominance, the machine lets go of its other half, leaving it bloodied and maimed.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Повинуясь приказу, серво-голова крепко вцепляется в горло живой. Металлический клюв, словно тиски, продолжает сжиматься, пока противница не издает жалкий вопль. Доказав свое превосходство, машина оставляет искалеченную вторую половину в покое.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Obeying your command, the servo-head bites hard on the throat of its living counterpart. The metal beak continues to tighten its grip like a vice until the victim shrieks plaintively. Having asserted its dominance, the machine lets go of its other half, leaving it bloodied and maimed.{/n}

{n}Obeying your command, the servo-head bites hard on the throat of its living counterpart. The metal beak continues to tighten its grip like a vice until the victim shrieks plaintively. Having asserted its dominance, the machine lets go of its other half, leaving it bloodied and maimed.{/n}

{n}The servo-head immediately obeys your command as it lunges and snaps at its living counterpart's throat. The metal beak tightens like a vice until the victim gives a plaintive shriek. Having asserted its dominance, the machine lets go of its other half, leaving it bloodied and maimed.{/n}

{n}The servo-head immediately obeys your command as it lunges and snaps at its living counterpart's throat. The metal beak tightens like a vice until the victim gives a plaintive shriek. Having asserted its dominance, the machine lets go of its other half, leaving it bloodied and maimed.{/n}

{n}The servo-head immediately obeys your command as it lunges and snaps at its living counterpart's throat. The metal beak tightens like a vice until the victim gives a plaintive shriek. Having asserted its dominance, the machine lets go of its other half, leaving it bloodied and maimed.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サーボヘッドは即座にコマンドに従い、生きた頭部の喉元めがけて飛びかかり、噛みつこうとした。金属のくちばしが万力のように締めつけ、被害者が哀れな悲鳴を上げるまで離さなかった。優位を示した機械は、血まみれで無残な姿となったもう半身を解き放った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-head immediately obeys your command as it lunges and snaps at its living counterpart's throat. The metal beak tightens like a vice until the victim gives a plaintive shriek. Having asserted its dominance, the machine lets go of its other half, leaving it bloodied and maimed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サーボヘッドは即座にコマンドに従い、生きた頭部の喉元めがけて飛びかかり、噛みつこうとした。金属のくちばしが万力のように締めつけ、被害者が哀れな悲鳴を上げるまで離さなかった。優位を示した機械は、血まみれで無残な姿となったもう半身を解き放った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Servokopf gehorcht deinem Befehl sofort und schnappt nach der Kehle seines lebenden Gegenübers. Der Metallschnabel zieht sich zusammen wie ein Schraubstock, bis das Opfer klagend kreischt. Die Maschine hat ihre Dominanz bestätigt und lässt von ihrer anderen Hälfte ab, die blutig ist und übel zugerichtet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-head immediately obeys your command as it lunges and snaps at its living counterpart's throat. The metal beak tightens like a vice until the victim gives a plaintive shriek. Having asserted its dominance, the machine lets go of its other half, leaving it bloodied and maimed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Servokopf gehorcht deinem Befehl sofort und schnappt nach der Kehle seines lebenden Gegenübers. Der Metallschnabel zieht sich zusammen wie ein Schraubstock, bis das Opfer klagend kreischt. Die Maschine hat ihre Dominanz bestätigt und lässt von ihrer anderen Hälfte ab, die blutig ist und übel zugerichtet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La tête mécanique vous obéit immédiatement et plonge vers la gorge de son adversaire. Le bec d'acier se referme comme un étau sur la trachée de sa victime qui pousse un cri plaintif. La machine relâche alors son emprise, ayant ainsi prouvé sa supériorité sur sa seconde moitié à présent ensanglantée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-head immediately obeys your command as it lunges and snaps at its living counterpart's throat. The metal beak tightens like a vice until the victim gives a plaintive shriek. Having asserted its dominance, the machine lets go of its other half, leaving it bloodied and maimed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La tête mécanique vous obéit immédiatement et plonge vers la gorge de son adversaire. Le bec d'acier se referme comme un étau sur la trachée de sa victime qui pousse un cri plaintif. La machine relâche alors son emprise, ayant ainsi prouvé sa supériorité sur sa seconde moitié à présent ensanglantée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La servocabeza obedece inmediatamente tu orden y se abalanza sobre la garganta de su contrapartida orgánica. El pico metálico se cierra como un torno hasta que la víctima suelta un chillido lastimero. Habiendo demostrado su supremacía, la máquina afloja la presa y deja a su otra mitad maltrecha y ensangrentada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-head immediately obeys your command as it lunges and snaps at its living counterpart's throat. The metal beak tightens like a vice until the victim gives a plaintive shriek. Having asserted its dominance, the machine lets go of its other half, leaving it bloodied and maimed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La servocabeza obedece inmediatamente tu orden y se abalanza sobre la garganta de su contrapartida orgánica. El pico metálico se cierra como un torno hasta que la víctima suelta un chillido lastimero. Habiendo demostrado su supremacía, la máquina afloja la presa y deja a su otra mitad maltrecha y ensangrentada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}机械头立刻听从了你的命令，猛地扑向活体头的咽喉。它的金属喙仿佛虎钳一样收紧，直到活体头发出了哀怨的尖叫为止。机械头在确认了胜利者的地位之后，终于放开了鲜血淋漓、满是伤痕的活体头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-head immediately obeys your command as it lunges and snaps at its living counterpart's throat. The metal beak tightens like a vice until the victim gives a plaintive shriek. Having asserted its dominance, the machine lets go of its other half, leaving it bloodied and maimed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}机械头立刻听从了你的命令，猛地扑向活体头的咽喉。它的金属喙仿佛虎钳一样收紧，直到活体头发出了哀怨的尖叫为止。机械头在确认了胜利者的地位之后，终于放开了鲜血淋漓、满是伤痕的活体头。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hizmobaş, ivedilikle emrine itaat ederek yaşayan öteki yarısının boğazına saldırıyor. Kurbanı ağlamaklı bir çığlık koparana dek metal gagasını mengene misali sıkıştırıyor. Üstünlüğünü kanıtlayan makine, yaşayan yarısını kan revan içinde bırakarak gagasını gevşetiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servo-head immediately obeys your command as it lunges and snaps at its living counterpart's throat. The metal beak tightens like a vice until the victim gives a plaintive shriek. Having asserted its dominance, the machine lets go of its other half, leaving it bloodied and maimed.{/n}
